title: Replace Our Work Section Photos with New Uploaded Project Photos

requirements.summary: Save all 14 newly uploaded project photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ with standardized filenames
acceptanceCriteria: All 14 uploaded images are saved as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the filenames work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg.
Each file is accessible via the /assets/generated/ static path in the browser.

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded project photo '60417559408__EA07A836-4DBF-4202-B2B6-336CE9DC4F64.jpeg' showing outdoor kitchen construction framing with galvanized steel studs on a brick paver patio with workers visible in background as a static asset with dimensions 1080x1350.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_2193.jpeg' showing stone-clad outdoor entertainment wall with recessed TV niche and linear gas fireplace insert, viewed from side angle as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_7416.jpeg' showing completed stainless steel built-in grill in a smooth stucco outdoor kitchen island with travertine countertop and tile flooring as a static asset with dimensions 1080x1350.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_7407.jpeg' showing modern outdoor kitchen island with travertine tile countertop and stacked stone veneer accent panel, under construction as a static asset with dimensions 1080x1350.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_3062.jpeg' showing aerial view of outdoor patio with stone veneer walls, wood ceiling fan, linear fireplace, and artificial turf as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo '60418777983__B4A1B7E7-D0BE-4D92-827F-4719EDF3DE81.jpeg' showing outdoor kitchen frame wrapped in Wonderboard Lite cement board beside a backyard pool, pre-stucco stage as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.
Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_3573.jpeg' showing outdoor kitchen frame wrapped in blue board insulation inside a garage, showing U-shaped layout as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_0619.jpeg' showing covered outdoor living space with stacked stone fireplace wall, ceiling fan, Kamado grill, and teal patio furniture as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_2833.jpeg' showing outdoor kitchen frame built with galvanized steel studs and Hardiebacker board in a desert backyard with gravel as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_7766.jpeg' showing luxury backyard with rectangular stone fire pit, travertine tile deck, rectangular pool, spa, artificial turf, and pergola as a static asset with dimensions 1080x1350.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_2569.jpeg' showing outdoor kitchen island under construction with cement board cladding, worker measuring, travertine tile flooring as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_0039.jpeg' showing close-up view of galvanized steel joist framing for an outdoor kitchen roof structure against a bright blue sky as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_7794.jpeg' showing completed outdoor kitchen island with stacked stone veneer, stainless steel grill, three-drawer unit, and red Kamado grill at dusk as a static asset with dimensions 1080x1350.

Save the uploaded project photo 'IMG_2641.jpeg' showing galvanized steel outdoor kitchen frame laid flat on a driveway showing grill cutout and access door openings as a static asset with dimensions 1280x960.

requirements.summary: Update the Gallery (Our Work) component to display the 14 new project photos from static assets, removing all previous photos while preserving existing layout and functionality
acceptanceCriteria: The Our Work / Gallery section displays exactly the 14 new project photos and no previously existing photos.
All images are loaded from /assets/generated/work-01.jpg through work-14.jpg as static paths (not fetched from the backend).
The responsive grid layout, lightbox modal, previous/next navigation, and category badges remain intact and functional.
No placeholder images, broken images, or old photos appear in the gallery.

file_operations.description: Replace the existing gallery images array with the 14 new project photos using paths frontend/public/assets/generated/work-01.dim_1080x1350.jpg through frontend/public/assets/generated/work-14.dim_1280x960.jpg. Update the image objects to reference these static asset paths and preserve all existing gallery functionality including the responsive grid layout, lightbox modal with previous/next navigation, and category badges. Ensure proper aspect ratio handling for mixed 1080x1350 and 1280x960 dimensions. Do not modify the gallery layout logic, modal controls, or any other UI elements.
